explains: v. 获得，取得；起源于，来自；提取，衍生（化学物质）
wordGroup: derive from 源出，来自，得自；衍生于

sentences.en: Most patients derive enjoyment from leafing through old picture albums.
sentences.cn: 大部分病人能从翻阅旧相册中获得乐趣。

sentences.en: Mr. Ying is one of those happy people who derive pleasure from helping others.
sentences.cn: 英先生是那种助人为乐的快活人。

sentences.en: Elegance, he believed, did not derive from abundance.
sentences.cn: 他相信，优雅并不来自于繁冗的装饰。
